oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
A voting place for a state election
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of men, women and children stand outisde a one story building. A sign states, "General Election."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children; Political elections; Queues; Signs; Voting; Wooden sidewalks
Talbot, Nancy; Thomas, Jim; Van Hicks, Mr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Woman at top in light dress has been identified as Nancy Talbot. The man on the landing smoking a cigarette has been identified as Jim Thomas. The second man on the left holding a piece of paper has been identified as Mr. Van Hicks.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
